message.content:
cs.NE, cs.ET, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY

The paper discusses the implementation of a neuromorphic system for learning and computation, which falls under the category of computational neuroscience (cs.NE). The use of mixed-signal substrates for emulating neuron and synapse dynamics suggests the category of electronic devices and circuits (cs.ET). The paper also discusses the use of on-chip learning and simulation of a virtual environment, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the energy efficiency and power budget of the system, which suggests the category of control systems (cs.SY).
